name: Finance Tracker
description: Looking for a centralized system for your finances? You've come to the right place!In this Finance Tracker Notion Template, you will get the following sections:Overview. This is a section where you can easily see all of your current and archived summaries. It includes grand totals, yearly totals, account balances and a graph that shows you how much profit you've earned that particular year.Finance Tracker.
